## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                              |
| Rationale                         | To ensure stock availability and cover potential demand fluctuation, a higher order size that accounts for a margin of error is recommended.  The combination of 20,000 units (vendor option) + 471 units (current stock) provides coverage beyond the forecasted demand. This also minimizes the need for frequent reorders and takes advantage of a potential discount for ordering above the minimum purchase quantity (17,100 units).  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Player planned 17,704 units, this recommendation is 2,296 units higher. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.35 days                               |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                     |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size will allow for sufficient stock on hand over the next 5 days, even with potential deviations in the forecasted demand. This strategy minimizes risk of stockouts and allows for a faster turnover rate compared to the player's plan. |
